skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: Experienced in building responsive and interactive UIs using React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Passionate about crafting seamless user experiences with modern design principles.

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: Proficient in developing robust and scalable server-side applications using Java, Spring Boot, and REST APIs. Skilled in authentication, database management, and API integration.

skills.title: Database Management
skills.description: Well-versed in MySQL and MongoDB, focusing on efficient database design, query optimization, and secure data handling.

skills.title: Cloud & DevOps
skills.description: Hands-on experience with AWS, CI/CD pipelines, and Docker. Skilled in automating deployments, managing cloud infrastructure, and ensuring application scalability.

portfolio.title: NeedsForYou
portfolio.description: A dynamic e-commerce platform built with React.js, Spring Boot, and MySQL. Features secure transactions, intuitive UI, and JWT-based authentication.

portfolio.title: Digitalized Systems for Educational Institutes
portfolio.description: A digital transformation solution designed to streamline administrative and academic workflows in educational institutions.

portfolio.title: FireFlare
